SEARCH
Package pegasus.geometry

Interface Boundary<V extends Vector<V>>

Type Parameters:
V - The vector used as the vertices of this boundary
All Known Implementing Classes:
BoundingBox, BoundingSquare
public interface Boundary<V extends Vector<V>>
The superinterface for boundary objects such as bounding squares and bounding boxes.
See Also:
  • BoundingSquare
  • BoundingBox

    Method
    Description
    boolean
    contains(V v)
    Returns whether this boundary contains the provided vertex v.

    Returns a tuple containing the corners of this boundary.

    Returns the maximum boundary vector of this boundary.

    Returns the minimum boundary vector of this boundary.

    Serializes this boundary into a string.

      boolean contains(V v)
      Returns whether this boundary contains the provided vertex v.
      Parameters:
      v - The vertex of which to check for containment
      Returns:
      true if this boundary contains the provided vertex v
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided vertex v is null
